question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_index_by_rule()] [Default Value] Can returning 0 when user_index doesn't exist cause incorrect 'global_index - 0' calculations for new users who haven't interacted yet? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Edge Case] When duration is 0, does returning rule.global_index without increment cause staleness issues if multiple transactions occur in the same millisecond? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Edge Case] When total_balance is 0, does returning global_index unchanged cause issues for the first depositor who should receive all rewards but gets none? (High)
